project_abstract.cdata: The project will consist of: (1) improvement of 375 km of road between Lima and Pucallpa and access road to Pucallpa and its river port; (2) improvement of 110 km of feeder roads; (3) construction of river ports at Yurimaguas and Pucallpa and expansion of the river port at Iquitos; (4) procurement of road maintenance equipment and installations; (5) procurement of hydrological equipment; and (6) consulting services.
